caption: In the video, a group is seen inside a command center engaged in tactical deployment and discussion. Suddenly, there's an unexpected event: an external robot invades their base and abducts one of their members. This robot is equipped with a large amount of heavy firepower. Together, the team collaborates and ultimately destroys the robot. Meanwhile, the robot headquarters is notified about this incident and decides to send more robots to pursue them. At this critical moment, the team gathers to discuss their next move and decides to drive a long distance to evade the impending threat.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)
